sense.name: corrupt morally
sense.examples: He demoralized the young people with wine and women. Socrates was accused of demoralizing young men. Do school counselors demoralize young children? He demoralzed them of morals.

sense.name: lower someone's spirits
sense.examples: The news demoralized her. The bad state of her child's health demoralized her. The boss's behavior demoralized everyone in the office. The continuous barrage demoralized the infantry. He had an inconsisten policy that demoralized his staff.
